version_description:
1-new feature for image edit
2-new feature for video edit
3-optimize long exprose
4-optimize slow motion
5-fix known issues

1-Facebook live option
2-Optimized functional performance
-Optimized performance

1 - Merge your videos.
2 - Add background music to your videos
3 - Fixed and optimized some performance issues

1 - You can make timelapse now under application mode-phone control.
2 - Improved motion timelapse under application mode-phone control.
3 - You can live on Sina Weibo via ZY Play now.
4 - You can add your profile on ZY Play now.
5 - Fixed and optimized some performance issues.
1. Fixed some performance issues

1 - Optimized display list of user Creations in Lightollector
2 - Optimized virtual dial adjustment performance under manual mode
3 - Fixed some performance issues

1. For Crane 2, added camera brand option of Canon
2. Added the option to activate/close wheel to adjust params
3. Added the function of accessing profile picture and nickname when signing in with other accounts
3. Fixed some performance issues

1 - Added compatibility of iPhone X.
2 - Optimized the performance of transition for iOS 9.
3 - Support video uploading to Lightollector directly when sharing.
4 - Fixed some performance issues.

1. Added function of long press to lock AE/AF
2. Added the option to publish photos / videos to Lightollector from device
3. Fixed some performance issues

1.Added Roll axis motion setting for Motion Timelapse.
2.Under Application Mode - Camera Mode, support focusing and zooming setting, and synchronized change with shooting point.
3.Under Motion Timelapse, after set save form as photo, support shutter speed setting.
4.Fixed some performance issues.

1.New Save option for customizing motion timelapse.
2.More customizable scene modes available for motion timelapse.
3.Improved performance and fixed some problems.
- Improved performance and fixed some problems.

- Updated the default setting of Time interval in Time lapse to 1/2s, prevent users from using the previous default settings directly and failure in Time lapse video making.
- Improved performance and fixed some problems.

1. Newly-updated APP interface (PRO):
- Supports VERTIGO shot
- Supports max. 4K 60fps for RESO
- Supports 1080P for SLO-MO
- Newly-updated BeatuyCam
2. Newly-added Smooth 4 interface for Device Connection,
3. Improved some other issues.

1. In “Cam Mode”-“Pro”, you can touch the phone screen to change settings
2. Introduce the language switch option in “Settings”
3. Fixed some problems

1. Fix the front camera tracking problem.
2.Repair the problem of professional camera entering the album.
3.Fix some known problems.

1. Fixed compatibility issues with iOS9.0,
2. Fixed the crash issue caused by invalid access to the camera,
3. Fixed bluetooth connection problems on some devices.

1. Fixed autopause issue in recording after 30 seconds,
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1.New version of Lightollector launched.
-Newly added Picks Collection to provide more fantastic works for you to discover.
- Newly added Follow List allows you to stay up to date with your favorite follows.
- Newly added Event List. Participate in the events directly through ZY Play and upload your work to win a handful of prizes！
- New interface for playing videos. Slide up or down to view more videos.
- More dedicated designed interface.
2.Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Fixed the problem of screen direction caused by switching between front and rear cameras;
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Now you can scan QR code to log in Web Lightollector;
2. Correct the sequence of pictures showing six-side calibration of SMOOTH 4;
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements;

1.You can open ZY Play via shared links.
2.A brand-new page for video sharing is available now.
3. Bug fixes and performance improvement.

1. Newly added topic sharing function,
2. Newly added activity sharing funtion,
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Newly added "Discover" feature for you to discover more functions!
2. Newly added "Academy" feature for you to view tutorials immediately!
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Support SMOOTH 4 firmware V1.77
2. Improve object tracking function with updated firmware V1.77
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements

1.Add the feature of group. Join the group to find more people with the same interests.
2. Add the feature of posting. Share the experience with more people in the group.
3. Add the function to publish a topic. Publish a topic to discuss with more people.
4. Fix for some known problems.

1.Compatible with WEEBILL LAB-connect to enter into the exclusive interface with the following features:
 - Newly added image transmission feature;
  - Newly added camera parameter settings;
  - Newly added advanced panorama feature;
 - Newly added time-lapse photography;
  - Newly added motion time-lapse photography;
 - Newly added motion sensor remote control;
 - Support APP one-button to start photo/Video;
More exciting features are waiting for you~
2.Optimize the visual design of the account system;
3.Fixed some known issues.

1.Support EVO2 with connection to enter the exclusive interface, and the functions are listed as follows:
-Newly added shooting functions
-Newly added parameter settings
- Newly added trajectory photography
More exciting features are waiting for you~
2.Fixed some known issues.
-Fixed some other issues

1. Compatible with iPhone XR、iPhone XS、iPhone XS MAX;
2. Fixed some other issues.
- Fixed some other issues.

1. Zoom sensitivity settings,
2. Focus sensitivity settings,
3. Fixed some other issues.

1. Optional image transmission quality settings for CRANE 3 LAB,
2. Message notification on recent works' feedback,
3. Fixed some other issues.
-Fixed some other issues.

1. Newly-added "Follow Gimbal" under Six-side calibration.  After activation, the stabilizer will retain user's presaved gimbal settings after calibration through the App,
2. After Six-side calibration, choose "Follow Gimbal", restart the stabilizer, the gimbal settings will be saved for the future,
3. Fixed some other issues.

1. Newly-added "Follow Gimbal" under Scene mode. After activation, the stabilizer will retain user's presaved gimbal settings after calibration through the App,
2. Scene mode, choose "Follow Gimbal", restart the stabilizer, the gimbal settings will be saved for the future,
3. Fixed some other issues.
Fixed some other issues.

Video Editor:
-Trim video clips to the perfect length;
-Add filters to your photos and create a mood;
-Customize your video with text and stickers;
-Add background music to your video；
-Adjust your video parameters；
Fixed some other issues.
- Fixed some other issues.
- Fixed some other issues.

1. Compatible with SMOOTH-Q2,
2. Compatible with third-party compatible stabilizers,
3. Fixed some other issues and improved the user experience.

1. Compatible with WEEBILL-S; Choose corresponding device to connect in the App.
2. Newly-added motion-sensor control capability for more creative shots.
3. Fixed some other known issues.

1. Support connection to TransMount Image Transmission Module in the App; Please swipe to"Accessories" - "TransMount Image Transmission Module" and tap "connect/enter now" to connect,
2. Newly-added "image" monitoring function under the App's pro cameras interface, supporting histogram, zebra stripes, focus peaking, monochrome display, and real-time monitoring,
3. Fixed some other known issues.
